title: Weezie, the Elephant with Allergies
description: Weezie is an elephant with an unusual problem. He is sick of living in an orphanage, but how will he ever get adopted when he leaves every visitor in a puddle of snot?This lightly illustrated short story is perfect for children ages 4-10. They will love the gross aspect of it, but will also learn an important lesson about acceptance and true friendship.
author: Maranda Russell
